title: Biden And Xi Unite On Nuclear Safety: Humans Over AI
content: US President Joe Biden and Chinese President Xi Jinping made a landmark agreement on Saturday, emphasising the importance of human decision-making over artificial intelligence when it comes to nuclear weapons.
summary: US President Joe Biden and Chinese President Xi Jinping made a landmark agreement on Saturday, emphasising the importance of human decision-making over artificial intelligence when it comes to nuclear weapons.

title: Xi Tells Biden About China's 4 "Red Lines" That US Must Not Cross
content: Chinese President Xi Jinping warned the United States on Saturday not to cross a "red line" in support for Taiwan, but told his counterpart Joe Biden that Beijing was willing to work with the incoming administration of Donald Trump.
summary: Chinese President Xi Jinping warned the United States on Saturday not to cross a "red line" in support for Taiwan, but told his counterpart Joe Biden that Beijing was willing to work with the incoming administration of Donald Trump.

title: Watch: Donald Trump, Elon Musk In Front-Row Seats At UFC Event
content: US President-elect Donald Trump was greeted by chanting fans as he attended the Ultimate Fighting Championship heavyweight bout at New York's Madison Square Garden on Saturday.
summary: US President-elect Donald Trump was greeted by chanting fans as he attended the Ultimate Fighting Championship heavyweight bout at New York's Madison Square Garden on Saturday.

title: Ice Cream, Luxury Hotels, Jets: How Kamala Harris' Campaign Cost $12 Million
content: The Kamala Harris campaign also funnelled $5.6 million to various left-leaning advocacy groups, including Voto Latino, Make the Road Action Fund, and Al Sharpton's National Action Network.

title: Russia Targets Ukraine Power Grids In Biggest Missile Attack In 3 Months
content: Blasts rang out across Ukraine's capital Kyiv and other cities early on Sunday, as Russia staged its biggest missile attack since August and targeted power facilities with the winter setting in, officials said.
summary: Blasts rang out across Ukraine's capital Kyiv and other cities early on Sunday, as Russia staged its biggest missile attack since August and targeted power facilities with the winter setting in, officials said.

title: VPN Use Violates Islamic Law, Rules Pakistan's Top Religious Body
content: In Pakistan, accessing blocked content via virtual private networks (VPNs) is prohibited under Shariah, or Islamic law, the country's top religious body has declared.
summary: In Pakistan, accessing blocked content via virtual private networks (VPNs) is prohibited under Shariah, or Islamic law, the country's top religious body has declared.

title: Chris Wright: Trump's Energy Secretary Pick Who Is A Climate Change Sceptic
content: US President-elect Donald Trump has selected Chris Wright, a campaign donor and fossil fuel advocate, as the next Secretary of Energy.
summary: US President-elect Donald Trump has selected Chris Wright, a campaign donor and fossil fuel advocate, as the next Secretary of Energy.

title: Three Suspects Arrested After Flares Near Israel PM's Home: Police
content: Three suspects were arrested, Israeli police said Sunday morning, after two flares landed near Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's residence in the central town of Caesarea.
summary: Three suspects were arrested, Israeli police said Sunday morning, after two flares landed near Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's residence in the central town of Caesarea.

title: As Paul-Tyson Fight Streamed Online, 'Battle Of Baghpat' Stole The Show
content: The Battle of Baghpat is a bizarre and chaotic brawl, where two chaat vendors in Uttar Pradesh’s Baghpat clashed over who could attract more customers to their stalls.
summary: The Battle of Baghpat is a bizarre and chaotic brawl, where two chaat vendors in Uttar Pradesh’s Baghpat clashed over who could attract more customers to their stalls.

title: Heir To Rs 2,500 Crore Fortune Accused Of Stabbing Friend 37 Times
content: Disturbing details have come to light in thetrial of UK's Dylan Thomas, accused of killing his childhood friend and roommate, William Bush, on Christmas Eve 2023.
summary: Disturbing details have come to light in thetrial of UK's Dylan Thomas, accused of killing his childhood friend and roommate, William Bush, on Christmas Eve 2023.

title: Biden Visits Amazon, The Jungle That Nearly Killed Teddy Roosevelt
content: Joe Biden on Sunday will be the first sitting US president to visit the Amazon -- the vast tropical rainforest that nearly killed a predecessor, Teddy Roosevelt, after he left office.
summary: Joe Biden on Sunday will be the first sitting US president to visit the Amazon -- the vast tropical rainforest that nearly killed a predecessor, Teddy Roosevelt, after he left office.

title: China Cautions US To 'Make Wise Choice' To Keep Relations Stable
content: Xi cautioned that a stable China-US relationship was critical not only to the two nations but also the "future and destiny of humanity".

title: US Man Who Went On Crime Spree With Mother 'Dragon Lady' Speaks Out
content: Kenneth Kimes and his mother, Sante, infamously known as the Dragon Lady, were convicted of killing New York socialite Irene Silverman in 1998.

title: US Reports First Case Of New Mpox Strain 'Clade 1', Public Risk Remains Low
content: The United States has confirmed its first known case of clade 1 mpox, a more severe strain of the virus, in California.
summary: The United States has confirmed its first known case of clade 1 mpox, a more severe strain of the virus, in California.

title: "Lots Of Stories": Astrophysicist Reacts To Congressional Testimony On Aliens
content: Astrophysicist Adam Frank weighed in on recent US congressional testimony about unidentified aerial phenomena (UAPs) and alleged alien life, dismissing the claims as just "stories".

title: Trump's Defence Pick Faces Scrutiny Over Thin CV, Medieval-Themed Tattoos
content: Facing questions about an alleged sexual assault and medieval-themed tattoos linked to extremist groups, Donald Trump's defense secretary nominee Pete Hegseth would struggle to be confirmed for the job under normal circumstances.

title: "Noise Bombing": North Korea's New Weapon Drives South Koreans "Crazy"
content: North Korea has begun blasting eerie, unsettling sounds across the border into South Korea, tormenting villagers and disrupting daily life.

title: Gold Watch Of Captain Who Saved 700 Titanic Passengers Sells For $1.96 million
content: $1.96 million is the highest amount ever paid for memorabilia belonging to Titanic, the auctioneers said.

title: Brazil First Lady Uses F-Word For Elon Musk In Viral Video. He Reacts
content: Brazil's first lady, Janja Lula da Silva, swore at billionaire Elon Musk during a G20 social event on Saturday at which she spoke about the need to regulate social media to rein in misinformation.
summary: Brazil's first lady, Janja Lula da Silva, swore at billionaire Elon Musk during a G20 social event on Saturday at which she spoke about the need to regulate social media to rein in misinformation.
